qas.question: How long was Chopin's funeral delayed?
How many people arrived for Chopin's funeral?

answers.text: the Church of the Madeleine in Paris

qas.question: How long was Chopin's funeral delayed?
How many people arrived without an invitation?

context: The funeral, held at <a3_0>the <a0_0>Church of the Madeleine<a0_0/> in Paris<a3_0/>, was delayed almost <a1_0><a4_0>two weeks<a4_0/><a1_0/>, until 30 October. Entrance was restricted to ticket holders as many people were expected to attend. <a2_0><a5_0>Over 3,000<a5_0/><a2_0/> people arrived without invitations, from as far as London, Berlin and Vienna, and were excluded.
